SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwBotrirScript

Begin onDeath
	SetStage fbmwRecoverWidowmaker 90
END

Begin OnPackageEnd fbmwrecoverwidowmakerfollow
	Message "Die Witch!"

	SetStage fbmwRecoverWidowmaker 31
	SET fbmwRecoverWidowmaker.FollowNow TO 0
	SetEssential 0botrir 0
	mwBotrirREF.EvaluatePackage

;mwIveriLlothriREF.SetAV Aggression 100
	mwIveriLlothriREF.ModDisposition mwBotrirREF -100

;mwBotrirREF.SetAV Aggression 100
	mwBotrirREF.ModDisposition mwIveriLlothriREF -100

	mwBotrirREF.StartCombat mwIveriLlothriREF
	mwIveriLlothriREF.StartCombat mwBotrirREF
END

Begin GameMode
	IF GetDistance mwIveriLlothriREF <= 256 && GetStage fbmwRecoverWidowmaker < 31
		Message "This is close enough!"

		SetStage fbmwRecoverWidowmaker 31
		SET fbmwRecoverWidowmaker.FollowNow TO 0
		SetEssential 0botrir 0
		mwBotrirREF.EvaluatePackage

;mwIveriLlothriREF.SetAV Aggression 100
		mwIveriLlothriREF.ModDisposition mwBotrirREF -100

;mwBotrirREF.SetAV Aggression 100
		mwBotrirREF.ModDisposition mwIveriLlothriREF -100

		mwBotrirREF.StartCombat mwIveriLlothriREF
		mwIveriLlothriREF.StartCombat mwBotrirREF
	ENDIF

;	IF fbmwRecoverWidowmaker.FollowNow == 0 && GetQuestRunning fbmwRecoverWidowmaker && GetStage fbmwRecoverWidowmaker < 31
;		mwBotrirREF.EvaluatePackage
;	ENDIF
END
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 0 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
